pr_title: Fix download condition for JavaFX static libs

timeline.message: Fix download condition for JavaFX static libs
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/gluonhq/substrate into jfx-static

timeline.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText:
Yes, I did.
We used the javafx list to verify that those files are available or not. If any of them is missing, we download.
Now we need to split that in two: jars and libs. Okay.
But your code is doing:

if any jar is missing and either lib exists -> download

so at this point, if a jar is missing but one lib exist, it won't download. Or if all jars exist, but no lib is found, it won't download.
Imo, the check should be:

if any jar is missing -> download, or
if none of these libs is found -> download
